question: Which state Government rolls out new Tourism policy?
explanation: Assam State Government rolled out 'Tourism Policy of Assam 2017' with an aim to increase tourist inflow in the state by at least two to three times within next five years. Tourism Policy of Assam 2017' will be effective from January 2018 to December 2022. In the policy, special emphasis has been laid on making the state a preferred destination of film making by offering a range of incentives to movie producers.
